/**
 * @template T

function registerGroup(name, groups) {
  if (!(name in groups)) {
    groups[name] = [];

  return groups[name];
}

function addToGroups(t, flags, groups) {
  if (flags[numeric]) {
    flags[asciinumeric] = true;

  if (flags[ascii]) {
    flags[asciinumeric] = true;

  }

  }

  }
  if (flags[emoji]) {
